author: dblevins
msg: Warnings are logged when a bean doesn't assign a transaction attribute to one of it's methods. [Task] The logging statement uses log4j directly, it should be updated to use the logging interface instead.
SessionSynchronization.  Fixed a nasty typo, the code should have been checking for STALEFUL but was accidentally using STATELESS.
SessionSynchronization.  Code wasn't correctly checking if the transaction attribute was Never or NotSupported.

author: dblevins
msg: Some great support for mapping transaction attributes to interface methods
